data_descriptor.name: inspiration_duration
data_descriptor.description: Inspiration duration time computed from a valley to the next peak

data_descriptor.name: expiration_duration
data_descriptor.description: Expiration duration time computed from a peak to the next valley

data_descriptor.name: respiration_duration
data_descriptor.description: Respiration duration time computed from valley to valley

data_descriptor.name: inspiration_expiration_duration_ratio
data_descriptor.description: Inspiration duration divided by expiration duration

data_descriptor.name: inspiration_expiration_velocity_ratio
data_descriptor.description: Ratio of Inspiration to Expiration Velocity

data_descriptor.name: inspiration_expiration_area_ratio
data_descriptor.description: Ratio of Inspiration to Expiration Area

data_descriptor.name: expiration_respiration_duration_ratio
data_descriptor.description: Ratio of Expiration to Respiration Duration

data_descriptor.name: resspiration_area_inspiration_duration_ratio
data_descriptor.description: Ratio of Respiration Area to Inspiration Duration

algorithm.description: Takes the Respiration raw and baseline datastream and combines them to get the recovered respiration.From the recovered respiration it generates an array of respiration features per respiration cycle
